header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Backend software engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable distributed systems and platforms. Proven track record developing high-performance messaging systems, event-driven architectures, and infrastructure components that serve millions of users. Strong background in systems programming with Go, Scala, and C#. Expertise in schema registries, streaming data platforms, and backwards-compatible API design.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained critical runtime infrastructure for Disney's Streaming Data Platform, serving schema registry and messaging systems to 50+ engineering teams across Disney+ and Hulu platforms
Developed a high-performance event streaming system using AWS Kinesis, DynamoDB, and IAM for real-time data processing with guaranteed message delivery and consumer state management

Built a stream-snapshot state management system enabling teams to maintain consistent application state from event streams, integrated into the Disney+ content metadata unification project processing millions of content events
Implemented a robust backwards-compatible schema evolution system using AWS Smithy and OpenAPI, ensuring zero-downtime deployments across distributed services with complex validation pipelines
Engineered a multi-language code generation pipeline (Scala, Java, Python, Protobuf) with automated semantic versioning and artifact publishing to support diverse runtime environments
Designed CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for schema validation, compatibility checking, and automated releases with comprehensive testing frameworks

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed core runtime components for a proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala and Akka actors, implementing distributed consensus algorithms and peer-to-peer networking protocols
Built a node management HTTP API for runtime configuration, key management, and transaction signing with secure TCP communication between distributed network nodes
Created a real-time transaction streaming service using http4s and Cats Effect with MongoDB indexing, enabling efficient querying and streaming of blockchain data to client applications
Pioneered Postman integration for automated API testing in CI/CD pipelines, creating comprehensive test suites that served dual purpose as validation tools and live documentation for end users

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Engineered an event-sourced change management system for construction project tracking using Event Store for high-performance event persistence and replay capabilities, enabling real-time collaboration features for construction project stakeholders with full audit trails and backwards compatibility
Developed full-stack features for a web application serving construction teams using C# microservices on the .NET platform with Azure deployments and MSSQL database integration
Built API endpoints with comprehensive error handling and data validation, supporting integration with Vista ERP system for synchronized project management workflows

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Developed an automated testing framework using C# and Selenium for API and UI validation, enabling non-technical team members to define test cases with simple code interfaces
Created a performance testing suite for load testing a microservices architecture, ensuring system responsiveness under high concurrent user loads
Implemented headless browser testing using Selenium with XPath-based UI automation, providing comprehensive regression testing for critical user workflows
